title: Kizumonogatari II: Nekketsu-hen (Kizumonogatari Part 2: Nekketsu)
synopsis: No longer truly human, Koyomi Araragi decides to retrieve Kiss-shot Acerola-orion Heart-under-blade's severed body parts that were stolen by three powerful vampire hunters. Awaiting him are Dramaturgie, a vampire hunter who is a vampire himself; Episode, a half-vampire with the ability to transform into mist; and Guillotinecutter, a human priest who is the most dangerous of them all.
related_anime: ['Monogatari Series: First Season', 'Kizumonogatari III: Reiketsu-hen', 'Kizumonogatari I: Tekketsu-hen']
voices: ['Sakamoto, Maaya', 'Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Horie, Yui', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Irino, Miyu', 'Ootsuka, Houchuu', 'Ebara, Masashi']
